title: why do ı have to lose because of my teammates
body:
ı lose 99% of my games because of very hard feeding teammates even tho ım winning my lane ı cant help them because they feed much more then ı get kills and even if ı try to help other lanes they cant engage or play properly am ı just stuck with this 
https://imgur.com/a/ZMuyAgg

replies.body: I snipped your image. We don't allow naming and shaming on any kind here. You may feel free to repost the image if you censor out your teammates' names. Also, it is possible to 1v9. Not easily, but it is possible.
Because it's a team game. You can also win because of your teammates despite doing poorly such as that 0/9/1 game you had.
ı told my teammates not to come top and give me kills so that they (kayle and tryn pres) would make much gold of off me and my team would fight them 3v4

That doesn't stop the fact that you did poorly in the game and yet your teammates still won the game despite that. In fact, you did far worse than any teammate in the screen-shot you're linking.

It proves that you can both win with someone doing poorly and that you can win *despite* doing poorly.
what am ı supposed to do against being camped by a duo that makes one immortal for 7 seconds and slows me forever and that is my only hardcore feed in a really long time

Pretty much anyone that does poorly can make an excuse why they did poorly.

"I was camped"
"I was countered"
"My teammates never supported me"

and so on.

But all of that is irrelevant to the point I made. You did poorly. Yet, your team won. Why you did poorly doesn't really matter.

Its not all about getting kills. Its what you do with it that matters. And if you loos 99% Of the time  cause of feeders. Did you consider  that  you are maybe doing something wrong. Sometimes y you can loos cause of feeder but that cant be for 99% the reason you are loosing.
how can ı make you watch my replay

> [{quoted}](name=TR Seth,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mk9ViR9,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-01-13T18:37:27.586+0000)
>
> how can ı make you watch my replay

Actually i can watch your replay from my own client. In case you dint know you can watch others replay  but only for that patch. For instance i say  patch to show you but like lets say  you make some very good plays and maybe even a penta  in patch 9.1 aslong if its patch 9.1 you can rewatch the replay but once its patch 9.2. You cant rewatch those from 9.1 Anymore
watch my latest game if you can and tell me that ı didnt help my team

> [{quoted}](name=TR Seth,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=7mk9ViR9,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-13T18:43:57.060+0000)
>
> watch my latest game if you can and tell me that ı didnt help my team

 i am not gonna do that cause of a phew reasons.


1. Im a top main to so ik how it feels.


2. check my elo on op.gg.


3. I was in s7 also stuck in gold for pretty mutch the entire season and wasnt able to get to plat when you check  my op.gg you can see were i ended in the end.




4. i Wasnt able to get out cause of feeders to but ik to get higher i needed to step up my game and get better. I keep a good eye on the patch to see something got nerft of buffed watch some youtubers that can tell how big of a impact the patch has and watching streams. And that if i lost with a champ to mutch i better should look for something els.


5. Be harder for yourself if you make a bad play. What i have learn in my climb was that by knowing what i did wrong i could learn of it and avoid the mistake in future games even with no feeders i was a little hard for myself. Things like pushing when my team actually needed me or that i had to be more alert with the mini map seeing if my jungler was going to red/blue or he maybe needed my help befor my enemy top would come help first.





edit. i put numbers in it from 1 to 5 but when posted it shows 1 with every reason idk why.
You can win with feeders though
What sort of answer are you looking for? Venting is fine, but I'm not sure what we're supposed to really say in response here.
I saw images.. Maybe stop playing Renekton and start playing some TF champs..
